message: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

message: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

message: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

message: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
author: Roy T. Bennett

message: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Zig Ziglar

message: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

message: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

message: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

message: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

message: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

message: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

message: Your time is limited, don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs

message: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

message: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

message: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

message: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
author: Henry Ford

message: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

message: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

message: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
author: Unknown

message: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

message: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

message: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

message: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
author: Roy T. Bennett

message: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

message: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
author: Brian Tracy

message: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
author: Chris Grosser

message: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

message: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

message: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
author: A.A. Milne

message: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

message: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself as to why you can’t achieve it.
author: Jordan Belfort

message: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

message: You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
author: Maya Angelou

message: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
author: Booker T. Washington

message: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
author: Tony Robbins

message: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
author: Bo Bennett

message: Today’s accomplishments were yesterday’s impossibilities.
author: Robert H. Schuller

message: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

message: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

message: A goal is not always meant to be reached; it often serves simply as something to aim at.
author: Bruce Lee

message: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
author: Anonymous

message: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
author: Anonymous

message: Great things never come from comfort zones.
author: Anonymous

message: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
author: Anonymous

message: Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.
author: Anonymous

message: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
author: Anonymous

message: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
author: Anonymous

message: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
author: Anonymous

message: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
author: Anonymous

message: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
author: Anonymous

message: Little things make big days.
author: Anonymous

message: It’s going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
author: Anonymous
